titleStmt.title: A true narrative of that grand Jesuite Father Andrews who lived at Hardwick in Monmouthshire. How he fled into a large wood to escape justice. How he came to an untimely end, and the manner of his burial. In a letter to a friend in London.
titleStmt.author: J. D.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: J.D. Skenfreth, July the 2d. 1679.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
